synopsis.text: Kanamie, Arimura, and Grace, three boys from diverse backgrounds, find themselves united by a shared ambition: to become professional jockeys. Enrolling in an elite horse racing academy, they face rigorous entrance exams that test their academic, physical, and athletic abilities. Arimura, a former idol, discovers his true passion for horse racing after witnessing a derby. Kanamie, raised on a remote island, nurtures a dream of racing with horses. Grace, hailing from a high-class English family, seeks to break free from his parents' expectations and forge his own path. The series follows their journey as they navigate the challenges and triumphs of the competitive academy, striving to become one with their horses.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
